CreateDeliveryStream.name: CreateDeliveryStream
CreateDeliveryStream.description: Grants permissions to create a delivery stream

DeleteDeliveryStream.name: DeleteDeliveryStream
DeleteDeliveryStream.description: Grants permission to delete a delivery stream and its data

DescribeDeliveryStream.name: DescribeDeliveryStream
DescribeDeliveryStream.description: Grants permission to describe the specified delivery stream and gets the status

ListDeliveryStreams.name: ListDeliveryStreams
ListDeliveryStreams.description: Grants permissions to list your delivery streams

ListTagsForDeliveryStream.name: ListTagsForDeliveryStream
ListTagsForDeliveryStream.description: Grants permissions to list the tags for the specified delivery stream

PutRecord.name: PutRecord
PutRecord.description:
Grants permissions to write a single data record into an Amazon Kinesis Firehose delivery
                                                stream

PutRecordBatch.name: PutRecordBatch
PutRecordBatch.description:
Grants permissions to write multiple data records into a delivery stream in a single
                                                call, which can achieve higher throughput per producer than when writing single records

StartDeliveryStreamEncryption.name: StartDeliveryStreamEncryption
StartDeliveryStreamEncryption.description: Grants permissions to enable server-side encryption (SSE) for the delivery stream

StopDeliveryStreamEncryption.name: StopDeliveryStreamEncryption
StopDeliveryStreamEncryption.description:
Grants permissions to disable the specified destination of the specified delivery
                                                stream

TagDeliveryStream.name: TagDeliveryStream
TagDeliveryStream.description: Grants permissions to add or update tags for the specified delivery stream

UntagDeliveryStream.name: UntagDeliveryStream
UntagDeliveryStream.description: Grants permissions to remove tags from the specified delivery stream

UpdateDestination.name: UpdateDestination
UpdateDestination.description: Grants permissions to update the specified destination of the specified delivery stream
